name: instant-status
description: Performant, robust, and clean monitoring application

scripts.ci: npm exec -workspaces -c 'rm -rf node_modules; :' && npm ci --workspaces && cd is-prisma && npx prisma generate && cd ../ && npm run slimbuild
scripts.build: npm exec -workspaces -c 'rm -rf dist; :' && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.slimbuild: npm exec -workspaces -c 'rm -rf dist; :' && cd is-config && npm run build && cd ../is-prisma && npm run build
